website_summaries.verdict: If you have a particularly large and nasty mold, mildew, or algae stain, buying a gallon of Gone is well-worth treating a large area in just a few quick minutes.
pros: Available in 32 ounce and 1 gallon sizes
Effective on nearly every hard surface, including drywall
Simply spray and rinse stains away in minutes
cons: Not for use on food preparation surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Super Great, NOTHING LIKE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I used all kinds of products to remove a mold that had formed in the shower, we spent money uselessly, buy this product after read the reviews and I hoping it would work. It's incredible, I know it sounds like that, incredible, but as soon as I received and after read the instructions and applied it to the parts that I had to clean in the shower, and about 15 minutes, without scrubbing or applying anything else, the shower was completely clean!!!! The only thing is the smell is very strong, but it last a couple of hours only. I really recommend it
customer_reviews.author: ROUS

customer_reviews.title: Usless product
customer_reviews.text: I have black spot mold on a sandstone outdoor bench. This product had absolutely no effect on it. It did however wilt the nearby plants that I stupidly hit with over-spray. I also applied it to the mold typical in shower stalls. Again, it had no effect, but it did stink up the house very nicely. The moral of the story is, if you have a mold problem, this is not the product for you. But if you want dead flowers and a smelly home, you can't beat this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Works for mold in showers
customer_reviews.text: This worked great on the mold in my showers and window sills. It’s smell is strong and off putting so consider ventilation of the area used.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works great
customer_reviews.text: We have a new mold problem around a chimney that is leaking. (Ohh so much rain....) I sprayed this around the edge of the chimney on the wallboard. It did a great job of removing the mold. Just want to warn folks that you need to vent the area because of the bleach smell is intense. But the stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: Tazman

customer_reviews.title: Works great on built up mold in the shower.
customer_reviews.text: Our shower is almost 30 years old and we are struggling with some mold issues. We are re-caulking it, but had to eliminate some built up mold first. This product did the job as advertised. Simply spray it on, let it sit and then rinse with water. It worked like a charm. I used the entire 32 ounce bottle to clear the old mold and just ordered a new bottle to have on hand to keep the mold at bay. This stuff really works. Use a mask and open windows. It’s strong!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Cost more but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I tried Tilex Mold Remover. After 4 applications the black mold was still very visible (subterranean concrete block wall). Using the GONE Mold Remover, it was totally removed after 2 applications. This powerful stuff has a strong odor, so spray and vacate the area for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Don Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Works shockingly well.!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I was expecting here, after failures with several off the shelf "mold and mildew removers" I was frustrated with being unable to clean some very stubborn mold and soap scum in a shower covered in 2" tiles... this stuff did the trick....it was like it was sandblasted off!, I did have to scrub some tight areas but overall, I have never seen anything work this well. The only thing I can say even remotely negative is you will use a lot of it on a tough job. (I used half a bottle ) and it has a very strong odor that will linger for awhile...which may be an issue for some folks...
customer_reviews.author: jhump5

customer_reviews.title: Holy %#€+ This Product Works
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a lot of money buying products to clean mildew,stains and soap scum. I have scrubbed with sponges, brillo pads and bleach. I have tried it all. I went browsing and saw this product and read all the reviews. I decided to give it a try. I sprayed several spots and like magic everything disappeared. No scrubbing, rubbing nothing just spray and the mildew, stains and soap scum will disappear before your eyes. The odor is strong so make sure you open the window. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake The Snake

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Used this outside my door. The frame had getting pretty dirty and moldy. I thought I’d need a lot of scrubbing but this worked far better than expected. Sprayed it on the concrete aound the door and frame. Waited about 5-10 minutes than rinsed it with some warm water. Tada! All gone. The mold and dirt was completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to clean the gunk off my granite wall shower without having to stand there scrubbing for hours. This brings a spray bottle with a small hose, so that you don’t have to have as much splash back as if you sprayed directly from the bottle, which is great. There is no scrubbing needed. I sprayed it and rinsed it and it was like poof done. Amazing!! Definitely wear gloves and a mask (smell was strong). Use a large ziplock to put the product in so it doesn’t touch anything-it can stain stuff). Def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Natie G

customer_reviews.title: removes like 70% of the mold
customer_reviews.text: The product works pretty well but I can't remove all the mold in my bathtub even after 3-4 applications. I must say you don't need to scrub at all as it works alone. But very careful with the fumes, open the window and put the extractor on and if possible wear a mask, the fumes are intense.
customer_reviews.author: eze 1906

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure about this.
customer_reviews.text: Well the sprayer is longer than the bottle by nearly two inches so it's hard to get it to fit in the bottle and close. I imagine there will be product waste when it gets low because it this. Did nothing for the area I was trying to clean but it did leave bleach spots on my new shirt because the pressure from pressing the sprayer causes the bottle to leak at the neck. I guess I know better for next time. Clean naked.
customer_reviews.author: aj from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in an article for cleaning window a/c units. It is totally wonderful! Kills and removes all the mold, dirt, etc. and works like a champ. Best to wear goggles & a face mask when using -- it has a very strong odor. You can't beat this for cleaning a/c units. I've purchased 4 bottles and will continue to use whenever they need cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Harris

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: My first bottle that I received, I received damaged and it had leaked all over the box. I contacted the seller and they sent me out a new one right away. I used it immediately on an old white ceramic sink and it took years and years of stains off. Everytime I look at it, I'm still shocked at how white it is now! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that removed the black mold from my bathroom tiles and grout. I have 5 other bottles of other brands that did absolutely nothing to remove it. I think it takes several applications to get rid of it all, but no scrubbing. The scent is super toxic so make sure you leave the room and ventilate.
customer_reviews.author: NorthernVAgirl

customer_reviews.title: Legit.
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a shower that had months' worth of black mold in the corners. Ten minutes after spraying, the shower was sparkling clean. Best part - no scrubbing! The product has a distinct smell, but it's not too bad, and it faded pretty quickly. No other product comes close to this stuff. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: First Person Omniscient

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This worked immediately removing all the mold where I sprayed. No scrubbing just spray. And it’s gone. I used on a large area and it worked great. Very easy There is a strong bleach odor until it dries so open a window
customer_reviews.author: Kim Rogers-Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell but it is a chemical
customer_reviews.text: I received it yesterday and put it to use right away. Use mask, gloves and eye pro it has a very strong smell so be very careful, left it on for a bout 3 hours and I could see a bit of difference. Do not leave it on overnight if you’re going to sleep and definitely keep children away from it. My bathroom was not bad, I’m just a bit of a clean freak. All I did was spray on and rinse with hot water. Next time I will scrub it with a brush. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Gomez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!! GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works!! I have used many other products for my shower. But this stuff is the bomb!!! For real - Spray it on when the surface is dry, wait a little,then spry off with water, you may need ti scrub a little depending on how much mold you have. Be careful it can mark your aluminum shower fixtures - looks like water spots. Know that now, I know how to clean my shower.
customer_reviews.author: david tatar

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have been sick and haven't been able to clean for about a year and the tub had gotten really gross. One spray of this stuff and I came back 30 minutes later (leave a window open) and it was gone. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Works instantly!
customer_reviews.text: Works instantly. I am cleaning up a 280 gallon aquarium that had accumulated a fair amount of algae on the sides, as well as film on the front. This stuff cleans it off and with just a little paper towel restores the acrylic to absolutely new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Works Amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Scent has a very powerful clorine odor but after rinse it Aires out quickly. I wish I had purchased the gallon the product is so amazing is works awesome cleaned better then any bleach or mold product iv purchased before highly recommend. I would love if this product came with a mask and high elbow rubber gloves cause I recommend using those too..
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Margeson

customer_reviews.title: Gone for good
customer_reviews.text: When it says industrial strength it means industrial strength. Respirator, eye and skin protection are essential. It works great and will destroy mold. But the smell was terrible even with proper ventilation. Overall if you have a bad area this stuff will do the trick. For very tiny areas I would go for something gentler.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It helps but there was definitely scrubbing involved
customer_reviews.text: I'm working to get years of gross out of a bathtub for refinishing and, while this cleaner did help a good bit, it was not enough to get the mold stians off even with extensive scrubbing. Though it was unable to get long-term mold off the tub, it did clean the shower grout pretty well with no scrubbing so I'm thinking it really depends on the level of mold you're trying to remove.
customer_reviews.author: franchesca

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This product really works and is easy to use. I used it to remove mold from a window and it worked beautifully. Will definitely buy it again. Planning to use on multiple surfaces to prevent mold.
customer_reviews.author: Yulie

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought at least three bottles of this instead of one bottle
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! I bought only 1 bottle to try it out. I'm queit pleased with the results after using this product. I will be placing an order to receive more of this here soon.
customer_reviews.author: Aik

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective!
customer_reviews.text: It works! I had been battling black mold in my shower constantly, always recaulking. I considered getting a new tub shower and got a 10 thousand dollar estimate! Way out of my budget, but after using this, I don’t need a new tub anymore anyway!
customer_reviews.author: S & K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have a windowed back patio with immovable screens over the windows. They were growing algae and looked pretty nasty and nothing worked to get rid of it, nor could I really scrub them. As I sprayed this stuff I could see the junk on my windows dripping off. They’re now clear and beautiful! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kelly smith

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing how quickly this worked on the mold on my plaster walls! Within seconds of spraying...it disappeared and without scrubbing. The smell is a little strong so just make sure to open a window or spray a little at a time but a little does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Wish i had taken a before & after
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this stuff is awesome! Do you need to wear gloves and a mask? Yes. And open a window? Yes. Is my shower cleaner then it has been in 10 years? Heck ya!!
customer_reviews.author: DolceSoprano

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works on mold and mildew where nothing else does! Just be sure to use gloves and a mask or a well-ventilated room just like the directions say. I've tried many off-the-shelf products over the years that don't begin to work on shower and tub grout. This gets rid of mold without scrubbing, just as advertised! Even works on ceramic sink stains making 15 yr old sink look new!
customer_reviews.author: dian20

customer_reviews.title: This really, really works its magic
customer_reviews.text: I got my package today 02/12/2020 sprayed it on the parts of my shower that were in desperate need and WOWSA it works so FAST and took care of ALL the problem spots. I didn't even have to scrub, wipe do anything its crazy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: cathielinck

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I've ever written a product review on Amazon (at least not that I remember), but I had to give this one a review because it's so effective and easy to use. It's very easy to assemble, easy to apply, and after rinsing, the effect is almost instantaneous. Having approached the same problem with other solutions (no pun intended), I wish I knew about this product and used it from the beginning. One drawback is the strong scent after use, so just be aware of that.
customer_reviews.author: Parents of 2

customer_reviews.title: Not for Heavy Duty Stains
customer_reviews.text: My basement shower has heavy duty stains due to the previous owner never cleaning it. I thought this product would work to help take it away but it did not. Will use it moving forward to clean weekly but it wasn't for the heavy duty clean up that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: God rid of some annoying bleach marks in my shower, which I hadn't been able to shift with standard cleaning products. Be warned - this product has a *very* strong bleach smell, best to wear breathing protection (I used a 3M 65021HA1-C), open your windows and go out for the day.
customer_reviews.author: eater

customer_reviews.title: This product does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: We tried the smaller spray bottle on our white vinyl fence that was starting to get some growth due to humid Florida conditions. We sprayed on and waited for a few minutes then used a low end power washer to rinse off and we now have a bright white fence that looks like new. No scrubbing needed. We ordered more in the gallon size to use whenever there is a need. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Dan D

customer_reviews.title: Will strip (not just clean) your furniture
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to freshen up our wood deck furniture and bought this product explicitly because it said it works for wood. As recommended, I tested it on a small part of the underneath of a table. It seemed okay so I sprayed it on the entire table top. When I hosed it down, the semi-transparent stain was stripped right off. The product is called “stain remover,” which I took to mean mildew stains... but it literally stripped the stain and ruined my table.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Strong smell equals strong results! Has done wonders cleaning the mold and mildew off of our little bathroom wall so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: No Scrub cleaning solution
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing. I Love the fact that there is no scrubbing. I just purchased a gallon after the 32oz bottle I just received. BZ to Gone.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy Bleach Instead
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product and missed the return window to send back to amazon. When you open the bottle you can tell instantly that its basically overpriced bleach. It essentially can't be anything more because mixing bleach with other chemicals is a big no-no! Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This does what it says. Only issue I have is the scent. Definitely need ventilation when using. Other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun J.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple items that are designed to remove mold & mildew, failed. This stuff works,!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: eln

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a last resort before having someone come in to clean the mold in our bathroom-it worked great, was very easy to use with almost no scrubbing. The smell was a bit strong, but went away after a bit (with the help of open windows). I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Abracadabra

customer_reviews.title: Husband Raved About It
customer_reviews.text: Husband's shower gets grubby because he does not dry it after use. This was so easy for him and removed shower scum on the doors. For me, it was too industrial to use, since I can't breathe in strong chemicals and odors.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K.

customer_reviews.title: WOW....Amazing Results
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. Mold in shower from a leaky faucet. We had scrubbed and scrubbed with no success. Sprayed this on, waited a few minutes and rinsed away. Only took one time and no scrubbing and it looks like new. Strong sent...ventilate well but you will be thrilled with the end result.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jett

customer_reviews.title: GONE Won't Disappoint!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is the real deal. It works! Unfortunately the previous owners covered up a mold issue and it wasn't disclosed. I have been fighting to get rid of the mold and have been unsuccessful until I purchased GONE!. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: fuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Great helper
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. This product is very strong but do not need a mask as mentioned in other reviews, but that’s my opinion of course. I would buy again. Reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Can be used on ceilings.
customer_reviews.text: I used the product on mold that had started to grow on the ceiling near the A/C vent in the bathroom. I used a mask and eye protection since I was spraying onto the ceiling. Since it was the ceiling, I did not scrub or rinse. The product worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked EXTREMELY WELL!! No scrubbing! Spray and let it sit and wash it down! This will my product of choice from now on! Finally!
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: wow this stuff works great
customer_reviews.text: ...be sure to vent the area. This stuff works well. It will definitely strip the color from any fabrics in comes in contact with.
customer_reviews.author: Persby

customer_reviews.title: Clean very quickly and effectively
customer_reviews.text: Perfect I like that its the first product I have wrote on Amazon really good. Maybe you can make less smell ?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK AS DESCRIBED!
customer_reviews.text: Despite all of the comments that I read, this product does NOT WORK! The smell is indeed very strong but it did not remove anything from the areas that I used it on. I followed all of the instructions and it did NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.author: Angelin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! We live in older house and our tub is prone to mold and in the two years I’ve lived here I couldn’t find a single product that would 100% get rid of the mold on and in our tub. After just minutes of using this product the mold was gone! Our tub looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I NEVER write reviews but this def needed one! The smell is strong but it literally kills the mold without scrubbing my shower looks brand new and i had tried everything before to kill the mold in the cracks! But the smell will knock you over
customer_reviews.author: cortney b.

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: wanted to clean fiberglass on boat. Product was no more effective than water.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L. Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: All gone
customer_reviews.text: It did what it said no scribing to kill mold
customer_reviews.author: Debra Copes

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Was so surprised with how this worked! Sprayed it in the corner of my shower where mold had been in the grout, cake back 15 minutes later and completely gone!!! Amazing. Scent is strong so be sure to ventilate
customer_reviews.author: Marie Bland

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It even took hair dye stain out of my bathtub. (we learned the hard way that overtone stains) my only complaint is the bleach like smell.. Make sure you open a window or use in a well vebtilated area.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mugnaini

customer_reviews.title: Did not work!
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT work. Used it twice. Used more than recommended and left it on for longer than instructions said the 2nd time. Didnt get rid of ONE BIT of the mold I sprayed it on (rubber around the door of my washing machine).
customer_reviews.author: danielle bertolini

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I have some mold in my bathroom and this product did not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn L Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This products works so well and I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who cares how bad it smells
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!! Of course the smell is bad, but the clean it leaves behind more than makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon King

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It does what it was intended to do. Please note you can't return product, though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different cleaning products to get rid of the mold and mildew that grows in my bathtub. I sprayed this on and left for a few hours, and the tub looked brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Wreckitbeck

customer_reviews.title: Worked like magic!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Read directions, sprayed down the problem areas, and watched the mold/mildew disappear. Very happy with the results, will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Instantly helped remove some mold from bathroom ceiling which could not be scrubbed off! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Qian

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, removed the mold in our bathroom as avertised.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, removed the mold after a couple of applications. Tried many other products but none of the worked. Our shower looks new again, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard L.

customer_reviews.title: bathroom tile was squeaky clean
customer_reviews.text: I found the product was very good at cleaning my bathroom shower tile. the smell is very strong, so I recommend leaving the room for an hour or so and then go back in and rinse.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scott

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: this product cleaned the stains out of my rv awning. i had neglected to clean it on a regular basis but this made it almost like new. slight bleach smell
customer_reviews.author: harrod

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells something awful, but it is amazing. Spray, let it sit, and rinse it off....no scrubbing necessary! Just make sure it’s a well vented area!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Powers

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: Be careful!! Ended up in the hospital hours later with chemical pneumonia and i wore a mask, goggles, and gloves. I was so scared, had to call poison control and was sent to the ER
customer_reviews.author: Eboni

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent! Very simple to use and the results are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Therapist

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Strong Smell. But Strong and Effective results. Mold, Rust, Pink Algae is gone in matter of seconds to minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Urayoan R.

customer_reviews.title: It’s Just OK
customer_reviews.text: It cleans mildew, but not dark mold in the shower. I wish it worked better. Now I will have to replace the grout.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Well-worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is crazy good! Just like it says, spray it on infected areas, let it sit for 10 minutes and then wipe. Done.
customer_reviews.author: ptooey

customer_reviews.title: Works like magic!
customer_reviews.text: Literally sprayed and wiped clean with no issues. Does exactly what it says it does!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Although the scent is extremely STRONG - it works! No scrubbing and amazing results..
customer_reviews.author: Janelly Banegas

customer_reviews.title: It worked when other products didnt
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked really well. I used “Mold Control” and it did not work. This is some heavy duty stuff and I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: David Shamiri

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing. Worked so well just be care of the smell if using in a small space
customer_reviews.author: Kaylea

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: The best solution I've found to deal with stubborn mold and stains from mold..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gone, and it truly is.
customer_reviews.text: Just spray and wipe off and mold completely gone. No scrubby needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Griffin

customer_reviews.title: It does just what it says.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is amazing as it does the job as advertised in cleanling mildew in my shower.
customer_reviews.author: steve kramer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It worked amazing sprayed it like 2 months ago and still no mold!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: DOES THIS PRODUCT WORK?
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS EXTREMELY WELL... I WILL ORDER THE GALLON SIZE NEXT TIME...VERY SATISFIED
customer_reviews.author: NUMBER 7

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: This really works! It is amazing! Shower caulking looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Tana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mold & Mildew Killer
customer_reviews.text: I tried all kinds of mildew & mold removers for my boat, and nothing really worked very well... until I bought this bottle of "Gone". Holy smokes, this stuff is magic! I sprayed a section of my boat's stern platform, let the solution sit for a minute or two, and Whammo! --the mold completely vanished! "Gone" is a terrific product, and should be a standard item for every boat on the planet. I'm ordering many more bottles soon, and trust me--- it works! Very little odor, and it makes other mold removers look like pond water--- no scrubbing, just a spray, and a wet sponge, and my boat looks darn near new!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fair product, super caustic and takes a lot of preparation!
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION: As stated, this product is EXTREMELY CAUSTIC!! You’ll need to be covered, PROTECTED-literally from head to toe, masked with good ventilation, make sure you don’t care about what you’re wearing and take it off before touching or sitting on anything. It takes a lot more of the product than I expected, even for small areas. I followed the instruction to the “T!” That said, it’s a fair product, especially good for getting the moss off of brick pathways that receive a lot of water/rain.
customer_reviews.author: Shoetastic

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t deliver on the promise
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely doesn’t deliver on its promise. It did not do anything to the mild mold stains on the bathtub and all that I got was a horrible smell and difficulties breathing. I can’t recommend this at all. I think it’s also a hazard if little children are in the house. The smell was so horrible like very strong bleach and I had to take my baby out overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but eats at the bottle.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great the first time I used it. I loved it! The second time I went to use it, the bottle had corroded or something and it wouldn't squirt right and got everywhere. You do not want to get this on your clothes, it is very bleach heavy. I was so excited about this product, but because it's unusable after one time I can't recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order this product because it is bleach-based. Tried everything to get the mold off my outdoor vinyl roller shades with natural remedies. Nothing worked. My husband sprayed this product on, and the mold disappeared within minutes. The shades look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella2012

customer_reviews.title: Killed the mold that other products couldn't!
customer_reviews.text: I had some stubborn black mold in my shower. I tried several other products with mediocre results. They reduced the mold, but they didn't get rid of it 100% . GONE killed it all dead. Just like the instructions say: I sprayed it on, waited a couple minutes, and rinsed. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: IconTom

customer_reviews.title: Works Quickly
customer_reviews.text: Use in a well-ventilated area or have a mask and goggles on standby. This product works amazingly well, and very quickly. However, it has a VERY strong smell and fumes. Practice chemical safety and you'll be good.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Works on boat seats
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product to clean my pontoon boat seats before covering for the winter. It cleaned the stains and streaks and made the seats look great. Wear skin, eye and hand protection while using.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves mildew
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't mind the smell of bleach, it lets me know something is cleaning. But I literally sprayed the mildew under the cocking in my shower and it was gone in under an hour. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Scott

customer_reviews.title: mold is gone
customer_reviews.text: Had a bit of mold starting in the shower, tried this product. It took three applications but it is now completely gone. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: David W. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: I CANT BELIEVE IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny you just spray it on leave it there for an hour or more if you need overnight if it's really bad and rinse off the next day or hour or whenever it really works
customer_reviews.author: Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works!!
customer_reviews.text: It absolutely works!! The mold in our shower literally disappeared in a few hours! The scent is extremely strong!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Pottle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great I was amazed, it clean up the black mold in attic roof great so thankful for this cleaning product!
customer_reviews.author: james c. nichols

customer_reviews.title: Really works well.
customer_reviews.text: When there's a lot of mildew, 2 or 3 applications may be necessary. But it's so easy to just spray the area again, and the black really does disappear completely and stay gone for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: GAYE SHREVE

customer_reviews.title: Still have stains
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't even certain that I had mold but there was moisture and there we stain which still remain. The cleaner seemed very strong based on the odor which lasted a long time. My reason for getting the product was to get rid of stain so based on that, I was not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Carrier

product_meta.title: Industrial Strength GONE Mold, Mildew & Algae Stain Remover | No-Scrub Stain Remover | Instant Results for All Surfaces - 32 oz.
product_meta.description:
Size:32 oz

Remove nasty mildew mold & algae stains in a matter of minutes – without the scrubbing work!

Tired of fighting mold and mildew problems in kitchens, bathrooms, basements, attics, boats with ineffective "mold removers" that show zero effect?

GONE! by FDC is your zero effort solution for stain and mildew free shower walls, toilet bowls, bathtubs, stainless steel sinks, kitchen and bath tiles, brick surfaces, concrete driveways, AC Units etc.

- Powerful cleaning formula for results in a matter of minutes

- Magic no-scrub formula - Watch mold and stains literally disappear

- Works on almost any surface

- Just spray on the affected area, let dry and rinse with water

- Save yourself time and the cost of expensive mold remediation

Unlike plain bleach, GONE! contains a surfactant that aids in the wetting ability for better coverage and increased results, along with a bleach stabilizer which ensures the bleach retains its potency for a far longer time. GONE! also contains an odor counteractant that helps control the harsh smell, making it easier and more pleasant to work with than plain old bleach.

Pro Tips: GONE! is a caustic chemical bleaching product. Please handle with extreme care. Wear Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) including protective goggles and a mask. Open doors and windows to avoid eye irritation or nasal discomfort. Do not use on food prep surfaces.

Keep away from new and beloved clothing and fabrics. Test product on an inconspicuous area and let dry before full application.

Free your surfaces from ugly stains and eliminate mold and mildew once and for all!

What are you waiting for?

Click "Add to Cart" now and get this mold and mildew remover today
feature_bullets: 60 DAY HASSLE FREE MONEY BACK PROMISE! SEE RESULTS IN A MATTER OF MINUTES - Fighting with stubborn and clinging mildew, mold or algae? This powerful cleaner will help you eliminate and get rid of those nasty mold and mildew stains in a matter of minutes! Each Gallon treats 300 to 400 square feet!

MAGIC NO-SCRUB FORMULA - Forget about mold and mildew cleaners requiring tedious scrubbing work! Simply spray the affected area and watch mold and stains literally disappear – ZERO SCRUBBING necessary!

USE FOR ALMOST ANY SURFACE - Safely eliminates mildew, mold, and algae from shower walls, toilet bowls, bathtubs, stainless steel sinks, kitchen and bath tiles, brick surfaces, concrete driveways, AC Units, wood decks etc. Ideal to use in kitchens, bathrooms, basements, attics, boats, fencing and exterior.

SIMPLE AND EASY TO USE - Apply mold and mildew remover spray at full strength. Before full application, test and let dry on an inconspicuous area. FOR BEST RESULTS: Spray on the affected area from bottom to top. Rinse with water. No scrubbing or rubbing required.

SAVE TIME AND MONEY - Safe and effective cleaning of mildew, mold, and algae within a matter of minutes! Save yourself the cost and trouble on mold remediation and get rid of those nasty stains today!
